LanguageData.ModsMissingText: The following mods are missing completely and MOD-E can not fix your mod list until you have resolved the list. Install mods from steam or by downloading them manually or mark them as permanently ignored:
LanguageData.PermanentIgnoreWarning: Do you want to permanently ignore this mod?\n\nNote: you can edit the ignore list at any time in the global MOD-E settings.
